articles.description: America closed out 2021 with strong jobs gains, economists predict. But just days into the new year, the Omicron variant is causing infections to soar and businesses to struggle. Will that derail the jobs recovery?

articles.author: Georgina Tzanetos
articles.title: Which Social Security Recipients Will Get an Extra $200 in January? - GOBankingRates
articles.description: The 2022 COLA increases have been applied to new Social Security payments for January, and the first checks have already started to hit bank accounts. See: What To Expect From Social Security in...
